text: Radko Polič (18 August 1942 – 15 September 2022) was a Slovenian actor. He won the Golden Arena for Best Actor at the 1976 Pula Film Festival and the Best Actor award at the 10th Moscow International Film Festival for his role in Idealist (1977). He died on 15 September 2022, one month after his 80th birthday. ==Movies== *Battle of Neretva (1969) *The Widowhood of Karolina Zasler (1976) *Idealist (1976) *Moment (1978) *Balkan Express (1983) *In the Jaws of Life (1984) *The End of the War (1984) *Taiwan Canasta (1985) *My Uncle's Legacy (1988) *Silent Gunpowder (1990) *Charuga (1991) *Mathilde (2004) *Libertas (2006) *Night Boats (2012) ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1942 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Slovenian actors
